From: Deb

Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2006 7:43 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: new here first post


Where do you live? That would help since the laws vary by state. You
might also look and see if there's a Yahoo group of unschoolers in
your specific state - they'd be way helpful.

--Deb

messages.subject: new here first post
messages.msgSnippet: Hello I am new to thias group but am very interested in unschooling or child led teaching I have three beautiful children Julia 7 , Aaron 4 1/2, and Haley 3 (
messages.messageBody:
Hello I am new to thias group but am very interested in unschooling or child led teaching I have three beautiful children Julia 7 , Aaron 4 1/2, and Haley 3 ( Daniel Angelo my angel )
that I am homeschooling I would love info on how to unschool and filing out the forms for the public school thank you I have been reading your posts about tatoos and piercing I think I have found the right group at last!!!!!!

GracieAnn
